Reviews.Title: “relaxing”
Reviews.Author: pdm02
Reviews.Content: After seeing reviews about Studio 1 we decided to check it out for a night..I have stayed at more expensive places and had to check out because of how dirty some were...not this place..as soon as you entered the room you can smell how clean it was..especially the bathroom which is so very important..this is a no frills motel but for how well kept it is was worth not all the fancy decor ect..will definitely do it again only longer..the only reason for the low rating is there is no pool or fitness

Reviews.Title: “Poor”
Reviews.Author: Looloo37
Reviews.Content: I booked this motel because it said it was minutes away from all shops, attractions etc... The only shop we found after walking over 3 hours was a seven eleven! The beds were full of sand as if the sheets hadn't even been changed and there was a dirty, stale coffee pod in the coffee machine that looked like it had been there for days! Guy at the reception could do with some customer service training and maybe a lesson on how to smile, what a miserable man! Will definitely not book again!

Reviews.Title: “Good lodge near the beach”
Reviews.Author: alcolo
Reviews.Content: We spent a night at Studio 1. Checkin was fast and easy, the room on the second floor had a beautiful view on the ocean and was big, clean and well equipped with fridge, microwave, dishes and cutlery, iron and iron board, safe. The only small issue we had was that the housekeeper apparently forgot to provide the room with towels. We asked for some towels at the front desk and everything was set. I definitely recommand it.

Reviews.Title: “Great stay”
Reviews.Author: indycargirl62
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Studio 1 Motel and had a good stay. The rooms are very clean, nice balconies, ocean view especially from the 2nd floor. Kitchen suites were really nice. Easy walk to the beach. Overall, a great stay.

Reviews.Title: “A great small place to stay”
Reviews.Author: dyoung20
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Studio 1 for one eveing before a cruise and we LOVED it. They really take care of there place. Yes it is small but it is just what you need for a beach vacation.

Reviews.Title: “Clean, quite, comfortable”
Reviews.Author: nich1Georgia
Reviews.Content: Very Clean, loved the laminate flooring. Rooms were comfortable, spacious kitchen. Good rates. Great for when you want a beach get a way and don't need the extras of a large motel. Across the street from the beach. Short walk. Beds were very comfortable. Thank you for a great stay.

Reviews.Title: “beatiful little motel”
Reviews.Author: Suzanne60-11
Reviews.Content: You are looking for a small but very clean motel, this is the one for you, Studio 1 is a small, very well keap motel, rooms with laminate floors, some have a kitchenet, patio set in the back for each room and bbq for the guest. On directly on the beach, but acces across the road, a 3 minutes walk and your feet are in the sand. Loved it and will go back again

Reviews.Title: “One Word- CLEAN”
Reviews.Author: KlasikLadyBug
Reviews.Content: Had to be the CLEANEST motel room we have ever stayed in! New towels, sheets, bedspreads. Good location, great rates. Good view of ocean from second floor. Now for the down-side: The desk clerk is behind a glass window, you have to stand outside(rain or shine) to check in, we couldn't even see who we were talking to...so it's kind of impersonable. We weren't able to get WIFI in our room or outside, had to drive down the street to a restaurant. Free coffee consisted of 2- small packets for a 4-cup coffee maker during a six night stay, we had to buy coffee at a grocer. We spent most of our time out of the room, sight-seeing, so we didn't request maid service on a daily basis, but on the 3rd day we did ask for maid service.... was a bit disappointed that the sheets weren't changed as we had sand in the bed. Our only real complaint would be the lack of notice that there would be painters working the entire week. First morning we woke up to the front of our room being sprayed off at 7a.m. We hurried out of the room about 8 as the painters were painting the outside walls and the stair railing. Our last night, the painters were painting the walkways and steps, actually painting while guests were in their rooms on bottom floor, making it difficult to leave their rooms.We returned late in the evening, tired and needing a rest before dinner, only to find the painter painting the walkway and sitting area in front of our room, he was annoyed that we had returned, so we left and sat down the street while he finished. We would have appreciated notice that the workers would be there, so we could schedule around them. The new paint made a world of difference to the motel.... a bright-fresh look. Floors are not hard wood...they are thin laminate... but still cleaner than carpet. I doubt that we will stay here again, but the rates can't be beat. Wouldn't consider this motel as "kid friendly"... there are no places to play... just the parking lot. There is no phone(but who doesn't have a cell phone these days?), no pool (but the ocean is just across the street). Walls are a little thin, so don't make any noises that you don't mind your neighbors hearing.... have learned to hate the snooze button on an alarm clock... our neighbor didn't want to get up.... and it can be embarrassing facing your neighbor after he's had a passionate night ;).

Reviews.Title: “Wow, home away from home!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: anita19750505
Reviews.Content: Stayed here for 2 weeks to get an inheritance, its clean, beautiful view, convienient to everything, well priced and definately worth getting a trip advisor app on my phone to spread the good word, thank you studio 1. Anita from dayton

Reviews.Title: “Get a room, enjoy the beach and stop whining!”
Reviews.Author: Jeffry R
Reviews.Content: We arrived in Daytona in mid November with no reservation. I tried finding some studios on line and we checked them out and were not acceptable. Nice hotel rooms I thought were overpriced for November at $100 a night. We saw the nicely painted yellow building and stopped. It's an older strip motel charmingly redone, a bit austere but the price was right so no complaints from me. No phone, no pool, no pets, no problem! Very clean, laminate floors a good choice, bed linens and mattresses clean. Nice table and chairs outside on the patio in the back of the hotel. Enough cooking stuff so we could do our own food and save a few bucks. Good sized fridge. Public beach access across street, had a blast. The neighbors behind have spotless homes. Some lightbulbs out were replaced next day. Thanks for a great stay.

Reviews.Title: “A pleasant surprise”
Reviews.Author: NativeAtlantaGirl
Reviews.Content: I booked via Priceline, not knowing property I'd end up at. I was looking for a place to crash for a night to continue drive to south Florida. Single female, I was a bit anxious that I'd end up in a dive. (I did have my firearm with me...) From exterior, it's not very impressive. I arrived around 9pm, it was dark & I thought "oh my!" The room, however, was a pleasant surprise. Laminate wood floor was a nice touch (so tired of grungy motel carpets!) - small kitchenette with microwave, fridge, real plates/utensils, etc. There was someone's food left in the fridge - but it was clean. Beds were comfy, nice table, adequate space-wise for me, I imagine it would be crowded for more than 2. The bathroom was very clean - but I did see 2 short black hairs on shower wall. (I'm a redhead). One thing that was odd was outlet in the bathroom - There wasn't one (or so I thought) I had to use cord in kitchenette. Turns out there was an outlet over the mirror - I wouldn't have been able to reach it unless I stood on toilet... The door is "old fashioned" key - security-wise, that was a bit of a concern, but the place was quiet. It is directly across the street from beach - great deal if you want close to the beach. I'd definitely crash here for an overnight or a couple days at the beach

Reviews.Title: “smokin only”
Reviews.Author: charles g
Reviews.Content: I emailed about a no smoking room and got no reply. So I booked a room for 2 nites assuming they had no smoking rooms. I get there, I have emphysema, and they put me in a smokin room. I stayed the 1st nite but left the next afternoon. Poor managment

Reviews.Title: “DISGUSTING”
Reviews.Author: sharri85
Reviews.Content: We went there for bike week...The price was good; however after spending $100 in cleaning supplies and wasting a whole day...we could have stayed somewhere much nicer!!! We put a "do not disturb" sign on our door to prevent the cleaning staff from using the dirty mop water on our floors. We knew that if the cleaning staff didn't clean before we got there they certainly wouldn't while we were there. The place was DIRTY!! you couldn’t walk on the floors without turning your socks or feet black!! We had to buy a mop!! The floors are NOT hardwood they are laminate. I have two words for the person that does laundry FABRIC SOFTENER! we had to wash our own towels and sheets because they were so rough and smelled like an ashtray. There was no phone in the room!! No hair dryer, we were given one after requesting it. When a hotel says a hair dryer is provided you shouldn't have to ask for one! The gentleman that worked the office acted like it was a bother. You have to pay the total stay when you check in, not when you leave!!! The washer didn’t work they did eventually fix it, but there was no explanation no apology, nothing! For 3 days HBO didn’t work! we finally told the cleaning staff and she fixed it. I haven’t seen a TV so big since the 80's! You can only take about a 2 minute shower...unless you like only cold water with no water pressure! The kitchen had about 4 forks, 2 spoons and 2 knives, the frying pan handle fell off after the second day. We were provided one after we complained, but the cleaning lady took one from another room to give to us! All the dishes and cabinets had to be washed before they could be used!! The garbage can had stuff growing in it! I think someone was doing a science experiment! The toilet was GROSS!! We had to change 2 light bulbs ourselves! the bar stools at one point were white...not any more they were stained beyond belief! The hotel is right on the street!!! a car going by sounds like it is in your room! The room is not insulated well enough to buffer any noise at all. Good luck crossing the street to get to the beach!!! The white glove award was won years AGO!.....probably when the hotel first opened. Part of my issue, when you are on vacation you shouldn't have to clean, or ask for a new frying pan because yours is awful, or change light bulbs. The rooms should be maintained by staff and these problems should not be discovered by guests. We shouldn't have had to tell staff the light bulbs were out (when we arrived) or that the frying pan handle was broken. This hotel has the potential for being nice, if it was well maintained. After voicing my complaints the hotel has done nothing to resolve my complaints besides blame me for keeping a "do not disturb sign on the door"

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay and a super value.”
Reviews.Author: MommyConnie
Reviews.Content: If you are looking for a great value and a clean room this is your place! Spacious room with a great kitchen. Close by everything. Definitely would stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “This is a very nice place!”
Reviews.Author: margar430
Reviews.Content: It is clean and affordable. We have been back 3x so far and will continue to do so. The kitchen units are very nice and spacious! We are very impressed. We love Daytona and have found my "home away from home" for our yearly vacation!!

Reviews.Title: “The Best - always go back”
Reviews.Author: Romeopumpkin
Reviews.Content: This is the best "mom and pop" motel around. We have looked at stayed at several different ones and now, we don't stay anywhere else. We stay there for Bike Week, Biketoberfest, summer vacations, etc. We can call and get a room, it is very convenient to everything and if you forget something, there is a 7-11 right next door. We love the wood floors. The only thing they could improve in is getting new beds (which they are in the process of doing). The bathrooms could use a little updating, but all in due time. We really love the place, the manager is very nice and accommodating, the cleaning staff is always nice and accommodating and we couldn't ask for more. We can sit out front and watch the people go by or sit out back on the private porches and have a party. Absolutely love and always recommend our friends.

Reviews.Title: “Great Except for Location”
Reviews.Author: schreckFlorida
Reviews.Content: I've stayed here several times so I already know the rooms are clean but the location is in the middle of nowhere on A1A. Wanna eat? Well, either go to the 7-11 next door or plan on driving a couple miles either way because no restaurants are nearby (those that were closed). On the plus side, extremely clean except for a hole in the shower curtain. Hardwood floors are much better than the dingy carpet you find in most rooms in this area.

Reviews.Title: “Not as nice as showen on website”
Reviews.Author: beachbound27
Reviews.Content: Stayed two nights in July was not as nice as it looks on website. Parking a nightmare. People partied all night next door. would never stay there again. Should have waited and checked out other places. Oh the Wi-Fi didn't work either until last day of stay 1 hour before we left

Reviews.Title: “satisfie”
Reviews.Author: 123tht
Reviews.Content: Reasonable price ($55 included tax)/ night. Very clean, Convinient to anywhere. We made reservation for 3 night,but had to leave sooner.The manager friendly solved problem . Would come back here in the future

Reviews.Title: “Convenient and roomy.”
Reviews.Author: Bitten86
Reviews.Content: My boyfriend and I stayed here for a night for the Budweiser Shootout. The hotel was just two levels and it was right off of Atlantic Ave. Parking is convenient because it is right outside of your doorstep. Just be careful when you back out of parking and don't accidentally back out into traffic!! There was a small window attached to the office where you check in. You ring the doorbell and wait a bit for someone to come see you. Once the man opened the window the smell of cigarette smoke came all out. I don't like smoke and I was not happy about that. I thought I reserved a room on 2nd level, but it was all booked by more people smoking. I was afraid the place might burn down that night. Once we opened the door the smell of smoke came visiting my nose again. Our room was quite big with a full kitchen. The room had 2 beds and a bar area with 2 bar stools. There were some drawers and a television. The bathroom was a good size, but the floor had this big yellow/brown stain a bit bigger than a basketball. They probably need to replace the tiles in the bathroom. In the kitchen there was a door to the back patio. There was someone's house behind the fence which I thought it was a little funny. There was a convenient beach access right across the street and a 7 Eleven RIGHT next door to the hotel. We went there so many times the clerk there thought we had no life. It was just about 10 steps from our door. After a little while in the room I started getting a headache because of the smell of smoke. When we left for the race and came back the smell was there. When we left the hotel the next day the smell was stuck on our pillows, towels, clothes, and bags. Check-out took a little a longer than I expected. Nobody answered our ring for more than 5 minutes. A nice housekeeping lady was kind enough to take the key from us and told us that we can take our time leaving the room. Overall the place would've been fantastic for if it was smoke free. I may consider this hotel again next time we go down to Daytona Beach.

Reviews.Title: “Nice Clean Place!”
Reviews.Author: rikk1105
Reviews.Content: Studio 1 Motel is very clean and has beautiful hard wood floors. The room has a full kitchen that is spotless. The appliances are practically brand new. This was a very comfortable place to stay and also very affordable. We were rained out for our whole vacation and still had a wonderful time. I would recommend Studio 1 to anyone who wants to stay in a clean and affordable place.

Reviews.Title: “Great place”
Reviews.Author: John1963
Reviews.Content: I moved from out of state and needed a long term hotel while i did apartment searching. I stayed here twice, the last time for 5 weeks. I was very happy with this hotel. It was an older 16 unit hotel that was totally gutted and remodeled by the owner who also owned a construction company. Everything was like new. I wasn't sure about hardwood floors at first, but soon came used to them...they keep the room smelling fresh as carpet soaks up sand etc. There is no phone in the rooms but it is next to a 7-11 with a payphone. There is also no pool but it is across the street from a huge vacant lot with public walkways to the beach. If you stay on the second floor you can see the ocean from your room/balcony. The manager who i got to know is a great guy and cares about the guests. I stayed in october when things were very slow and paid like 210 a week which was a great deal. If i was a tourist on a short vacation i would probably stay somewhere directly on the beach with a pool, but if you don't go swimming this is a great option.

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay!”
Reviews.Author: TravelingTeacher10
Reviews.Content: Studio 1 was a great, clean place to stay! The hotel was just like their website. The price for a weekly stay was very affordable--$309 plus tax. The ocean was directly across the street with a walkway to the ocean so access was easy. The staff was very nice and did a wonderful job everyday making sure our room was well taken care off. We had a great stay!

HotelInfo.Name: Studio 1 Motel
HotelInfo.Address: 1700 S. Atlantic Ave., Daytona Beach, FL 32118
